summary: THE DRIVERS WINDOW AND OR WINDOW(S) HAD BECOME INOPERATIVE.  THE CONSUMER WAS TOLD BY THE DEALER THAT THE PROBLEM WAS THE SWITCH, THEN WAS TOLD THAT THE PROBLEM WASN'T THE SWITCH BUT THE REGULATOR, AND WHEN THE PART WAS PLACED ON, IT FAILED AGAIN.  ALSO, THE CONSUMER STATED WHILE DRIVING, SHE HAD HEARD A BELL RINGING.  SCC
